content:
Here are shorter bullet points for each food item you listed:

1. Real Mayonnaise:
* Creamy, tangy condiment made with egg yolks, oil, and vinegar or lemon juice
* Can be used as a spread or a dressing
* Adds richness and flavor to dishes
* Made with high-quality ingredients
1. Real Mayonnaise:
* Creamy, tangy condiment made with egg yolks, oil, and vinegar or lemon juice
* Can be used as a spread or a dressing
* Adds richness and flavor to dishes
* Made with high-quality ingredients
1. Light Mayonnaise:
* Lower-fat version of traditional mayonnaise
* Made with egg yolks, oil, and vinegar or lemon juice
* Can be used as a spread or a dressing
* Provides a lighter option with the same tangy flavor
1. Light Mayonnaise:
* Lower-fat version of traditional mayonnaise
* Made with egg yolks, oil, and vinegar or lemon juice
* Can be used as a spread or a dressing
* Provides a lighter option with the same tangy flavor
1. Easy Cook Long Grain Rice:
* Type of rice with long, slender grains
* Easy to cook and versatile
* Can be used in a variety of dishes, like stir-fries, pilafs, and more
* Provides a good source of energy and some vitamins and minerals
1. Easy Cook Basmati Rice:
* Fragrant type of rice with long, slender grains
* Easy to cook and versatile
* Often used in Indian and Middle Eastern cuisine
* Provides a good source of energy and some vitamins and minerals
1. Scone Mix:
* Mix for making scones, a type of pastry
* Includes flour, sugar, and other dry ingredients
* Can be customized with added ingredients like fruit or chocolate chips
* Easy to prepare and bake
1. Fish Batter Mix:
* Mix for making batter for fish
* Includes flour, seasoning, and other dry ingredients
* Provides a crispy, golden coating for fish fillets
* Easy to prepare and cook
